workshoptitle: Leveraging Oracle Analytics Cloud with Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Provision your Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse Database (ADW) instance
Lab 2: Provision your Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC) instance
Lab 3: Connect OAC to ADW and adjust Data Set properties
Lab 4: Immediate basic insights on data
Lab 5: Ask Direct Questions on Data
Lab 6: Gain Insights with Visual Data Dialog
Lab 7: Monitor ADW activity and OAC Query Logs
Lab 8: Build a simple Interactive Workbook
Lab 9: Mash up additional Data Sets, Contextual Data Preparation
Lab 10: Geo Maps and Custom Binning
Lab 11: Leverage OAC Data Flow with ADW
Lab 12: Leverage Database functions with OAC
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
